sentences.sContent: This system is enshrined in our Constitution.
sentences.sCn: 我们的宪法使该制度神圣而不可侵犯。

synos.tran: 铭记，珍藏；把…置于神龛内；把…奉为神圣

remMethod.val: en(进入) + shrine(圣地) → 奉为神圣

trans.tranOther: if something such as a tradition or right is enshrined in something, it is preserved and protected so that people will remember and respect it
